name: Ext_R5_Measure_gr_po_inputPopulationId
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Measure.group.population.inputPopulationId for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Measure.group.population.inputPopulationId from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Measure|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The id of a population element in this measure that provides the input for this population criteria. In most cases, the scoring structure of the measure implies specific relationships (e.g. the Numerator uses the Denominator as the source in a proportion scoring). In some cases, however, multiple possible choices exist and must be resolved explicitly. For example in a ratio measure with multiple initial populations, the denominator must specify which population should be used as the starting point.
